base_description: White office chair with black armrests and base.
part_description: Chair has a rounded backrest, cushioned seat, two curved armrests, and a five-star wheeled base.
internal_interaction_description: The backrest connects to the seat, providing support. Armrests are attached to the sides of the seat, offering arm support. The seat is mounted on a central column, which connects to the wheeled base, allowing for stability and movement.
external_interaction_description: The chair interacts with the floor through its wheels, enabling mobility. It supports a person sitting, providing comfort with its cushioned seat and backrest. The armrests offer additional support. The chair can be adjusted or moved easily due to its wheeled base.
